snippet: Turkey arrested four prosecutors and a gendarme officer on Wednesday after they tried to search Syria-bound trucks that they suspected of illegally carrying arms for rebels fighting Syria’s government.
abstract: Turkey charges four prosecutors and a police officer with trying to 'topple or incapacitate' government, after arresting them for attempting to search Syria-bound trucks for illegal arms; trucks belonged to state intelligence agency.
lead_paragraph: Turkey arrested four prosecutors and a gendarme officer on Wednesday after they tried to search Syria-bound trucks that they suspected of illegally carrying arms for rebels fighting Syria’s government.

headline.main: Turkey: 5 Arrested Over Search of Syria-Bound Trucks
headline.print_headline: Turkey: 5 Arrested Over Search of Syria-Bound Trucks
